category.name: Aptitude
category.description: Develop mathematical reasoning and problem-solving skills for competitive exams and interviews.

sub_categories.name: Algebra
sub_categories.description: Master algebraic concepts, equations, and mathematical problem-solving techniques.

exercises.title: Linear Equations
exercises.description: Solve basic linear equations and understand algebraic fundamentals.

tasks.title: Linear Equation Solver
tasks.question:
Write a function to solve linear equations in one variable.

Your function should:

  • Accept coefficients a and b for equation ax + b = 0
  • Solve for x and return the solution
  • Handle special cases (a = 0, infinite solutions)
  • Return the solution as a fraction or decimal
  • Validate input parameters
tasks.hint: Use the formula x = -b/a, handle division by zero, and check for special cases

tasks.title: Linear Equation Properties
tasks.question:
What is the solution to the equation 3x + 6 = 0?

Consider: Linear equations have exactly one solution unless coefficients are zero
tasks.hint: Use the formula x = -b/a where a=3 and b=6

tasks.title: System of Linear Equations
tasks.question:
Solve a system of two linear equations using substitution method.

Your function should:

  • Accept coefficients for two equations: a1x + b1y = c1, a2x + b2y = c2
  • Use substitution method to solve for x and y
  • Handle cases with no solution or infinite solutions
  • Return both x and y values
  • Validate the solution by substitution
tasks.hint: Solve one equation for one variable, substitute into the other equation, then back-substitute

exercises.title: Quadratic Equations
exercises.description: Solve quadratic equations and understand their properties.

tasks.title: Quadratic Formula Solver
tasks.question:
Implement the quadratic formula to solve ax² + bx + c = 0.

Your function should:

  • Accept coefficients a, b, and c
  • Calculate discriminant (b² - 4ac)
  • Return real solutions using quadratic formula
  • Handle cases with no real solutions
  • Return solutions as decimals or fractions
tasks.hint: Use x = (-b ± √(b² - 4ac)) / (2a), check discriminant for real solutions

tasks.title: Quadratic Equation Roots
tasks.question:
What is the discriminant of the equation x² - 4x + 4 = 0?

Consider: Discriminant = b² - 4ac where a=1, b=-4, c=4
tasks.hint: Calculate b² - 4ac with the given coefficients

tasks.title: Factoring Quadratic Equations
tasks.question:
Write a function to factor quadratic equations when possible.

Your function should:

  • Accept coefficients a, b, and c for ax² + bx + c
  • Find factors that multiply to ac and add to b
  • Return the factored form (px + q)(rx + s)
  • Handle cases where factoring is not possible
  • Validate the factored form by expansion
tasks.hint: Find two numbers that multiply to a*c and add to b, then use these for factoring
